total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the input grids of the examples.
Q2: Notice that the pattern in the input grid is mirrored vertically in the output grid.
Q3: Identify the coordinates of the pattern in the input grid of the quiz.
Q4: Mirror the pattern vertically at the identified coordinates in the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
